title: Invite Friends and Earn Lifetime Income
description: Get a percentage of the trading and success fees paid by your friends or from all the investors of the trader's service when you invite a trader to Zignaly

step-1.title: Invite friends
step-1.description: Share your referral link above with <0>one click</0> for friends to sign up to Zignaly with

step-2.title: They invest in a Service
step-2.description: Get your friends to invest any amount in a Profit Sharing Service

step-3.title: You Both Earn
step-3.description: You'll earn unlimited commissions: {{successFee}}% of Success Fees paid to Zignaly. They get ${{reward}} in ZIG if they invest more than ${{minDeposit}}

terms.title: Fixed Terms:
terms.1: Zignaly reserves the right to disqualify a participant if he/she engages in inappropriate, dishonest, or abusive activities.
terms.2: Zignaly reserves the right to amend the Terms and Conditions of the referral program at any time without prior notice.
terms.3: Participants who violate these terms will not be eligible for referral incentives; any fraudulent or abusive behavior will result in immediate termination of all associated accounts.
terms.4: Paid online advertisements with the use of Zignaly's logo is strictly prohibited
terms.5: All the referral is calculated based on the revenue earned and realized by Zignaly.  All the calculations by Zignaly are final
terms.6: If any discount, you get commission after the discount
